title: AI Inventory Automation: Never Run Out, Never Overstock
author: Ekobol Operations Team
image_alt: Automated warehouse with real-time inventory synchronization
image_caption: Sync stock across 20+ marketplaces in milliseconds.
p1: Inventory mismanagement costs e-commerce businesses billions annually through stockouts, overselling penalties, and dead stock. Ekobol's AI Inventory Automation eliminates human error with real-time multi-channel sync, predictive restocking, and intelligent allocation.
li2_text: Sale on Etsy → Stock deducted on Amazon instantly
li5_text: If 2 simultaneous sales happen on different platforms
li7_text: Auto-cancels duplicate order and notifies customer
li8_text: Logs conflict for review (Dashboard → Inventory Logs)
li9_text: Customer in Berlin → Ship from Berlin warehouse (not Istanbul)
li11_text: Reduces delivery time 3-5 days → Happier customers
li12_text: Order contains Item A + Item B
li13_text: Item A in Warehouse 1, Item B in Warehouse 2
li17_text: AI calculates daily/weekly sales rate per SKU
li18_text: Example: Blue Widget sells 50 units every Friday
formula: Reorder Point = (Daily Sales × Lead Time) + Safety Stock
li21_text: Lead Time: Supplier delivery time (e.g., 14 days)
li22_text: Safety Stock: Buffer for unexpected demand spikes
p5: Free up cash flow from slow-moving inventory.
li25_text: Items with 0 sales in 90 days flagged automatically.
li26_text: Liquidation sale (30-50% discount), Bundle with bestseller, Donate for tax write-off.
li27_text: AI calculates profit lost by holding dead stock vs investing in winners.
p6: Sell product sets without manual stock tracking.
li29_text: When kit sells, AI deducts 1 of each component
li31_text: If Sunglasses run out, kit auto-marked 'Out of Stock'
li33_text: Auto-restocks kit when all components available
p7: Protect seller ratings during high-traffic events.
li34_text: Show 5 fewer units on Amazon than actual stock
li37_text: Reserve 10 units exclusively for your website
li38_text: Website has higher margins than marketplaces
li40_text: Email/SMS when stock drops below X units (configurable).
li41_text: Red alert if bestseller <5 units remaining.
li42_text: Morning report: 'You have 12 products running low'.
p9: Know the total value of your stock.
li43_text: Total Inventory Value = Sum(Cost × Quantity) for all SKUs
li45_text: Identify slow turnover (high value, low sales)
li47_text: Connect supplier via Ekobol Supplier Portal
li51_text: Allow selling out-of-stock items (accept orders, ship later)
li53_text: Auto-notify customers of expected ship date
li55_text: Compare system counts vs physical counts
li57_text: Adjust stock with audit log trail
p11: Stop counting boxes manually. Let AI handle logistics so you focus on growth.
